H0.text: What is the surname of the father and son who rode Grand National winners, L'Escargot in 1975 and Bobbyjo in 1999. Walsh

H1.text: What is the surname of the father and son who rode Grand National winners, L'Escargot in 1975 and Bobbyjo in 1999. Dunwoody

H2.text: What is the surname of the father and son who rode Grand National winners, L'Escargot in 1975 and Bobbyjo in 1999. Moffatt

H3.text: What is the surname of the father and son who rode Grand National winners, L'Escargot in 1975 and Bobbyjo in 1999. Carberry

A5.text: Tommy had been the rider twenty-four years earlier, the last time an Irish trained runner had won the race.
